long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Discover new possibilities for managing your notifications in Gmail with the "Custom Voice Notifications for Gmail" extension! ğŸ“§ğŸ”Š This tool allows you to create personalized voice notifications that inform you about new email messages.

Key Features:
ğŸ—£ï¸ Voice Notification Personalization:
Set your own voice messages to be played when a new email arrives.
Option to add a message before and after the notification content, e.g., "Mail from... John Doe has arrived."

ğŸšï¸ Voice Options:
Adjust the volume and pitch of the voice to suit your preferences.
Choose from various languages, including English, Polish, German, Spanish, and more.
Select the type of voice: male or female.

ğŸ‘¤ Sender Personalization:
Assign a nickname to a specific email address for more personalized notifications.
Option to save different configuration settings for different senders.

âš™ï¸ Notification Settings:
Configure the message in the "Message options" tab by adding the sender's email address and nickname.

ğŸ”Š Voice Configuration:
Adjust the volume, pitch, and language of notifications in the "Voice options" tab.
Choose the type of voice that best suits your needs.

The Custom Voice Notifications for Gmail extension is a functional tool for those who want to manage their inbox effectively and never miss an important message. ğŸŒŸ Download now and gain full control over your email notifications!

â—Disclaimer: All product and company names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. This extension has no affiliation or association with them or any third-party companies.â—
